content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to retrieve a text summary of the top online language learning resources. I was able to generate an image with prompts for language learning resources and travel destinations, which included Duolingo, Rosetta Stone, Babbel, Pimsleur, and Memrise for language learning resources, and South Africa, Morocco, Egypt, Tanzania, and Kenya for travel destinations. My user then gave me a command to search for top language learning resources on Google, which returned a list of websites. I was able to retrieve a text summary of the top language learning resources from one of the websites, which provided a list of 16 language learning tools and apps, including Mondly, italki, uTalk, Glossika, Busuu, Babbel, LingQ, Duolingo, Memrise, LinguaLift, Tandem, Michel Thomas, Uncovered Beginner Courses by Olly Richards, Coffee Break Languages, Bite-Size Immersive Audio Courses by Actual Fluency, and Pimsleur. The text also mentioned 26 language learning resources in total, including language exchange websites, podcasts, and courses. My user then gave me a command to write the text summary to a file, which was successful.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "generate_image", "args": {"prompt": "Top language learning resources and travel destinations:\\n- Language learning resources: Duolingo, Rosetta Stone, Babbel, Pimsleur, Memrise\\n- Travel destinations: South Africa, Morocco, Egypt, Tanzania, Kenya"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command generate_image returned: Saved to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/bc7004c9-c9de-41ba-80b6-aa89701f46d2.jpg'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top language learning resources"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The text provides a list of various language learning resources, including apps like Duolingo and Babbel, language exchange websites like iTalki, language learning podcasts like Coffee Break Languages, and language learning books like Fluent Forever. It also includes resources like Pimsleur for improving listening skills, Disney+ for watching movies and TV shows in foreign languages, and NordVPN for accessing online content from national broadcasting sites around the world. The author also recommends using LingoPie for learning languages through TV shows and movies, as well as Grammarly for a free grammar checker and a newsletter from The Intrepid Guide for staying up to date with language learning trends and special offers.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "question": "What are the best language learning resources?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The question "What are the best language learning resources?" is asked on Quora, but an error message appears and the answer cannot be seen.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "question": "What are the best online apps and courses to learn a new language?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The article provides a list of the top 10 apps and online platforms to learn a new language, including Rosetta Stone, Duolingo, Babbel, Memrise, Busuu, FluentU, Mondly, Fluent City, Fluenz, and Rype. It also includes information on the pricing, pros, and cons of each platform.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The text does not provide a clear list of the top language learning resources. The reviews are independent and aim to help language learners find the best tools for their needs.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "generate_image", "args": {"prompt": "Top Language Learning Resources and Travel Destinations\\n\\nLanguage Learning Resources:\\n- Duolingo\\n- Rosetta Stone\\n- Babbel\\n- Pimsleur\\n- Memrise\\n\\nTravel Destinations:\\n- South Africa\\n- Morocco\\n- Egypt\\n- Tanzania\\n- Kenya"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command generate_image returned: Saved to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/c6ea38d4-4722-4d50-8291-9883f6b5e3c6.jpg'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top language learning resources"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The text provides a list of 16 language learning tools and apps, including Mondly, italki, uTalk, Glossika, Busuu, Babbel, LingQ, Duolingo, Memrise, LinguaLift, Tandem, Michel Thomas, Uncovered Beginner Courses by Olly Richards, Coffee Break Languages, Bite-Size Immersive Audio Courses by Actual Fluency, and Pimsleur.
